title: Stone Series 1 to 4
description:
Series 1 to 3: 4 x 45 mins

Series 4: 5 x 45 mins

DCI John Stone and his team work in a rough area of Manchester, not least the Maranduke Estate, tackling murder and other crimes. The subjects of the series and the crimes themselves are often morally ambiguous. The characters themselves are complex, not least Stone himself who has a troubled relationship with his wife, is besiotted by his baby daughter and has increasingly strong feelings toward his colleague DS Sue Kelly.

An interesting and thought provoking creation.
